# The `SourceDelta` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-deltatree-cpp-/sourcedelta">SourceDelta</a> - As code in the original input buffer is added and deleted, <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-deltatree-cpp-/sourcedelta">SourceDelta</a> records are used to keep track of how the input SourceLocation object is mapped into the output buffer. <a href="#details">More...</a>
